headline: A Fresh Look At Avery Dennison (AVY) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves
summary: Why Avery Dennison (AVY) is on investors’ radar today Avery Dennison (AVY) has attracted fresh attention after recent share price moves, with the stock closing at $180.54 and showing mixed return patterns over the past week, month, and past 3 months. For investors watching materials and packaging names, those returns, combined with annual revenue of $8.77b and net income of $695.6m, raise questions about how the current price lines up with fundamentals and perceived value. See our latest...
